description: 1 aluminum landing craft of 6.5-6.7 meters with trailer, to be delievered to Fort Smith, Northwest Territories.
full_summary:
**Government Tender Announcement**
=====================================================

### Title
5P414-230081 – Aluminum Landing Craft with Trailer

### Reference Number
WS4092558412-Doc4148290251

### Type of Solicitation
Request for Proposal (Demande de Propositions)

#### Description
Parks Canada has a requirement for the fabrication and supply of one aluminum landing craft with trailer, measuring 6.5-6.7m in length, to be delivered to Fort Smith, Northwest Territories by March 31, 2025. This procurement is being conducted under Supply Arrangement E60MC-190001.

#### Regions of Delivery
Northwest Territories, Canada

#### Language of the Solicitation
English and French

#### Type of Procurement
Competitive – Selective Tendering

#### Evaluation Criteria
The selected bidder will be determined based on the lowest price received.

#### Trade Agreements
Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)
Canada-Colombia Free Trade Agreement
Canada-Korea Free Trade Agreement (CKFTA)
Canada-Honduras Free Trade Agreement
Canada-Peru Free Trade Agreement (CPFTA)
Canada-Panama Free Trade Agreement

#### Contact Information
Jason Smith
Departement of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)
11 Laurier St, Phase III, Place du Portage, Gatineau, QC J8X 0B3, Canada
(jason.smith@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca)

#### Notice URL
https://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/17183536?extsite=MTcxODM1MzZfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==

#### Closing Date
September 19, 2023, at 14:00:00 EST

Note: I only kept the requested details without any unnecessary information. Also, the notice URL was still maintained in the original format as the format was not clear in your instructions. Please let me know if there are any further instructions.  You can reach me at anytime for feedback and questions. 

Best regards, 
Technical Writer.
```
